name: maplibre-gl-inspect
description: Maplibre GL JS plugin for inspecting vector data

scripts.watch: mkdir -p dist && watchify index.js --debug -v --standalone MaplibreInspect -o dist/maplibre-gl-inspect.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js --standalone MaplibreInspect | uglifyjs - --compress --mangle -o dist/maplibre-gl-inspect.min.js
scripts.build-nice: mkdir -p dist && NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js --standalone MaplibreInspect | uglifyjs - -o dist/maplibre-gl-inspect.min.js

author: Andrew Calcutt(Forked from mapbox-gl-inspect by Lukas Martinelli)
